website_summaries.verdict: A glorified countertop toaster oven, this single trick gadget does too little and costs too much.
pros: The Philips Viva Collection Airfryer is compact, so it can easily fit on your counter
It's easy to use and clean as you can carry all the pieces that come into contact with food by a single handle
Plus, it'll competently cook snack food more quickly than an oven
cons: You won't mistake the food from this Philips for deep fried food
It takes awhile to make crispy fries and never made chicken wings crispy enough for my tastes
This model doesn't have any extra features like a stirring arm or alternate cooking modes

customer_reviews.title: Really just a tiny countertop convection oven
customer_reviews.text: I strive to keep my kitchen uncluttered and functional, filled with tools rather than gadgets. This is a gadget, and one that isn't better than a convection oven. In fact, a convection oven is better, because you can cook larger quantities. I wouldn't buy this again, and don't recommend this product for most people. I think it would be best used by single people who don't cook a lot and heat a lot of convenience foods (young college kids living alone, for example). Making fish sticks for one, a small amount of Oreida fries etc is what this product is best for. For all else--either frying or using a regular convection oven is better.
customer_reviews.author: Moya37

customer_reviews.title: Not good for more than two or three pieces of fish or chicken at a time
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, the functionality and clean-up. Unfortunately I returned it today because the capacity is so limiting despite being touted as larger than most. One potato cut into fries could not be cooked at one time. By the time a second batch could be cooked the first was cold. I found a larger capacity air fryer and went with it. For one person this Phillips would be ideal, for a family...not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! Fried chicken with no oil
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Fried chicken with no oil...I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd F.

customer_reviews.title: Makes fantastic tots
customer_reviews.text: I try to eat healthy and get my kid to do the same. There are lots of veggie blend tots out there now, and they turn out really great in the Airfryer. Crisp on the outside, but not dried out. My son will chow them down like they were fast-food fries. I've made my own sweet potato fries and they turned out really well. Haven't tried too many other things - chicken nuggets, etc, simply because I don't eat much of that.
customer_reviews.author: ReWarded08

customer_reviews.title: Philips TurboStar works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because my neighbor has one and likes it and there are so many different air fryers to pick from. This unit is not too big and perfect for 2 of us. If you are cooking for a family, I would suggest a bigger one. It is easy to use and easy to clean. What's not to like about frozen onion rings in 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to clean. Useful guidebook.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first airfryer we had and we had zero clue on how to operate it. The guidebook was useful. The interface (dials and stuff) is really intuitive and easy to use. It's easy to clean the components as well (everything is in the guidebook).
customer_reviews.author: Thanaporn

customer_reviews.title: Bought in August broke November.
customer_reviews.text: Guess we use it too much that the tray is misaliging and deforming from the heat. Now we can air that could seep In because even when it’s closed there’s a crack.
customer_reviews.author: GENEVIEVE PHIPPS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the price and condition.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the price and condition of this "refurbished" air fryer. Perfect size, easy to use, doesn't take up a large space on the counter top. It was a refurbished air fryer but looks brand new. Everything works great and it came in original box with instruction manual. (the box was damaged but the unit was not)
customer_reviews.author: Charlie N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great on French fries. Watching you tube helps in learning to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lilchickadee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up my kitchen like the oven!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on a whim when it was on the Treasure Truck one day and don't regret it at all! We've used it for cooking frozen french fries and breaded pork chops. We also use it often for reheating things. Everything has turned out wonderfully so far.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We use our air fryer often. It works great and helps eliminate some calories! Everything fries up well and works great for reheating wings or other "bar food". Love this and will buy another if this one ever dies!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my mother, so I haven't personally ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother, so I haven't personally used it. The first one came with a broken handle, and Amazon replaced with a new unit very quickly. She researched a bunch of air fryers ahead of time and this is the one she settled on. It has lived up to her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Crispy fries and nuggets without any oil. Easy to clean, efficient too.
customer_reviews.author: RockyRen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this air fryer for the first 4-5 months, then the basket started rusting. Ugh... Flash forward a year and the fan has died with no possibility to purchase a replacement fan. For $160 I expected better since there are so many other, MUCH CHEAPER air fryers out there.
customer_reviews.author: A. Guhl

customer_reviews.title: For the love of airfry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands birthday and its quickly become our most used appliance. Works great and comes apart for easy cleaning. The size works great for two but you'll have to do a couple rounds if cooking for more. If you're considering buying an airfyer look no further. I promise you won't be disappoint in the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this air fryer nearly every day since I bought it and I love it! Super easy to use and clean. The basket IS small so if you are planning to cook for more than 1-2 people, you may want to get a bigger machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no programming experience needed, very easy to clean, but we have found, for best results turn ur wings after 25 mins and cook for 15 more for crispy. Clean up in 30 seconds with most foods we cook
customer_reviews.author: charles orwig

customer_reviews.title: New to Convection Cooking
customer_reviews.text: This product represents my initial experience with a convection oven, so I can not offer any comparison. I will say that the oven seems solidly built and works well. I did notice that I've had to increase the cooking time over the recipe recommendation. That being said, I would recommend this Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stagnaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This Air Fryer is so simple to use and everything I've cooked in it has turned out perfectly. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The fryer works well, however it arrived with broken clips that hold the housing together. It was a gift for my daughter, who chose to keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh! Delicious food with hardly any mess.
customer_reviews.text: We just cooked our first meal in this air fryer. We cooked pork chops. All I had to do was put a little salt and pepper on them, put them in the air fryer, set the temperature and turn on the timer for 12 minutes. OMG the pork chops were fabulous!

customer_reviews.text: Knock out blow to a regular oven. I make low-carb dessert, cakes and mini-loaves in mine. Quick, little pre-heating required, and blazing fast.

customer_reviews.title: This ended up being an unhealthy purchase for us!
customer_reviews.text: Best ever air-fryer!! We bought this to reduce oil usage. It did reduce the amount of oil used for the food. But overall quantity of fries and chicken and fish intake has increased 4 fold as the cooked food is so delicious. We have started eating so much of these food, this ended up not giving any health benefits for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan

customer_reviews.title: This will change your kitchen experience! It can cook anything fast and good!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! You can make anything with it quickly and easily! And it's easy to clean. The app only has a few recipes that honestly make it more complicated than it needs to be. Just air fry instead of sauté or broil. For example, I just lightly coated some baby carrots with oil (I use avocado oil), then tossed in ginger power and garlic powder and air fried for like 10 minutes. Delicious! It also does amazing fried chicken! Anything!
customer_reviews.author: jMunny

customer_reviews.title: Too much airflow!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this airfryer. It has so much airflow that some foods don’t cook properly. It’s impossible to cook bacon because the high airflow moves the bacon around. Same with anything that is light. the air will move the food around in the basket. chicken wings come out blistered-the skin gets so much air that they dry out and blister. Ive tried different temperatures -same problem. I am convinced its due to the high airflow and there is no way to adjust it. Also when you open the basket to check on something, the fan keeps running. My old airfryer cooked much better and paused when you opened the basket. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LoraL

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my wife and she has used it every single day since. She absolutely loves it and so do I. Food actually does taste better and frozen french fries and tater tots taste homemade.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sobrido

customer_reviews.title: Everything works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Very good hot air cooker. Bought off the "Treasurer Truck", fun experience. Evrything works super and it cooks great, just now wishing I had checked out the digital controls model for more functions and a way to stop the cooking process.
customer_reviews.author: Saved Man

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Use it about 2-3 days a week. So handy. I love fish sticks and this makes cooking them a snap. Pop 10-12 in and set the timer for 15 minutes. They come out perfect....crunchy on the outside and perfect on the inside. Pop the handle off and toss the pieces in the dishwasher and you are ready to use it again. My favorite item in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Redman

customer_reviews.title: Essential to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: You can literally air fry anything with this! This is the best purchase I’ve made so far this year and do not regret it. Everything that I made so far was so delicious and juicy on the inside while crispy on the outside. It’s super fast to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia.

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as friendly as an instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I cannot put my finger on it but something about the product design seems incomplete. Can it work faster, can it be easier to clean (preferably dishwasher friendly), maybe a 3 pin plug...
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Everything it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reviewing several models-many less expensive. In this case, I think “you get what you pay for” rings true. This is easy to use, easy to clean, and is something I’ll reach for without dreading it. So FAR SUPERIOR to deep fat fryers!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this air fryer. It really works well. It makes the best french fries. You don't even realize not fried in oil. They are very crispy. Tried fried chicken the other night...terrific!

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This machine has impressed me very much. I warn bread with it. I make my kids French fries and also. I've made chicken on it too. I use it mostly for warning food but you can also cook stuff with it too.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!

customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one of these, onion rings and french fries come out crispy and not oily.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good air fryer. But there are a couple things I dislike. While cooking when you pull the basket to toss the ingredients, the air fryer continues to work. Others stop when the basket is pulled. And the detachable bottom can fall out if you shake vigorously.

customer_reviews.title: This airfryer makes healthy meals.

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a Christmas gift and love it. Uses it to air fry fries
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift and love it. Uses it to air fry fries, hot dogs, brats, and I even made a steak in it a few times! You can find some directions online on how to do a steak easily. The steak was surprisingly juicy and cooked perfectly! The size isn't bad. Feel like it could have a slimmer exterior profile.

product_meta.title: Philips TurboStar Technology Airfryer, Analog Interface
product_meta.description: Style Name:Analog| Size:5With the Philips Airfryer, you can cook healthier without giving up the taste and texture of your favorite foods. Using its unique Rapid Air Technology, the air fryer fries, bakes, roasts and grills with a tablespoon or less of oil making it a perfect solution for fast and healthy meals and snacks. The innovative TurboStar rapid air technology swirls the hot air rapidly through the whole basket of the air fryer, resulting in more even heat distribution. No pre-heating is required prior to cooking food in the air fryer. The Quick Clean basket includes a removable nonstick mesh and can be easily cleaned in up to 90 seconds.
feature_bullets: Up to 50% more homogenous end results with TurboStar Technology. Cord length : 40 Inches
Tasty food in less time: no pre-heating required
Universal removable handle - easily exchange accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,311 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
